demos.title: Approved Cookie Banner
demos.name: cookie-message
demos.description: This cookie banner should be used across all FT products and contains links back to the FT's cookie policy. The copy in the banner has been approved by the FT's legal team.

demos.title: Approved Alternative Cookie Banner
demos.name: alternative-cookie-message
demos.description: This cookie banner is a visual variant on the approved version for all FT products and contains links back to the FT's cookie policy. The copy in the banner has been approved by the FT's legal team.

demos.title: Custom Cookie Message (content only)
demos.name: custom-html
demos.description: You may customise the content of the Financial Times cookie message by providing markup as a child of the cookie message element.

demos.title: Custom Cookie Message (full)
demos.name: custom-html-full
demos.description: You may provide a core experience (without JavaScript) or customise the content and links of the Financial Times cookie message by providing markup as a child of the cookie message element.
